categories.emptyListMessage:
You haven't created any categories yet.

Some good examples for expense categories are: Bills, Shopping, Rent, Groceries, Car, Going Out, Vacation, etc.
Good examples for deposit categories are: Paycheck, Dividends, etc.

earlyRetirementCalculator.explanation: Many people wish to retire earlier than usual. This calculator allows you to find when you'll be able to retire depending on your personal financial situation. You will need to answer some questions to help us determine where you are now financially, how much you save or invest, what upcoming expenses you're expecting, and how much money you will need to live comfortably in retirement.
earlyRetirementCalculator.howMuchMoneyCapital: How much money do you have saved right now?
earlyRetirementCalculator.weHavePrepopulatedCapital: We have prepopulated the field based on the total funds that you have on all of your accounts.
earlyRetirementCalculator.weHavePrepopulatedSaving: We have prepopulated the field based on your average saving per month from the past year.
earlyRetirementCalculator.howMuchMoneySaved: How much money do you put aside in savings per month?
earlyRetirementCalculator.interestRateSavings: What is the interest rate on your savings account or fund?
earlyRetirementCalculator.pensionEligibilityAge: At what age do you become eligible for pension?
earlyRetirementCalculator.pensionIncome: How much would you estimate your net pension income per month will be?
earlyRetirementCalculator.haveLifeInsurance: Do you have life insurance with an investment option?
earlyRetirementCalculator.lifeInsuranceAge: How old will you be when your life insurance yields?
earlyRetirementCalculator.lifeInsuranceReturn: What is the return amount on your life insurance?
earlyRetirementCalculator.listAnyUpcomingExpenses: List any large expenses that you're anticipating before you retire.
earlyRetirementCalculator.retirementIncome: What monthly net income would you consider enough for you to live comfortably in retirement?
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem2b: You don't have anything saved up currently
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem3a: You save {{savedPerMonth}} per month on an account or fund with a {{savingInterestRate}}% yearly interest rate
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem3b: You don't put aside any money montly
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem4a: You are eligible for pension at age {{pensionAge}} and will recieve {{pensionPerMonth}} per month
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem4b: You are not eligible for pension
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem5a: You have a life insurance policy with an investment option that will yield {{lifeInsuranceReturn}} when you reach {{lifeInsuranceAge}} years of age
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem5b: You don't have a life insurance policy with an investment option
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem6: You have the following upcoming expenses to take into consideration:
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem7: You estimate that you'll need {{retirementIncome}} per month to live comfortably in retirement
earlyRetirementCalculator.summaryItem8: The calculation will assume a flat yearly inflation rate of {{inflation}}%
earlyRetirementCalculator.consideringTheAnswers: Considering the answers you provided you will be able to retire at age {{earlyRetirementAge}}.
earlyRetirementCalculator.notLikelyToRetire: You are not likely to retire at a reasonable age considering the answers you provided.

export.exportText: This will export all of your transactions in a .csv file which you can open in Excel and similar spreadsheet applications.
export.offlineText: You have to be online in order to export.

totalSync.syncText: This will remove any local data that hasn't been synchronized and reload everything from the cloud.
totalSync.offlineText: You have to be online in order to sync.

tooltips.tooltipWillNoLongerShow: This tooltip will no longer show. If you wish to retain it, go to the Menu page and click the "Help" button.

encryptedDescription.title: Encrypted description
encryptedDescription.question: What does this do?
encryptedDescription.answer: If you encrypt the Description it will not be visible without a password. When encrypting, it is highly advisable that you use a password that you will not forget (like for example your Personal Assistant password). If you forget the password you will be no longer able to decrypt the Description, only reset/change it.

taxCategories.title: Tax categories
taxCategories.question: What does it mean?
taxCategories.answer: Transactions made within a tax category will be not be considered as regular expenses and will simply be exempted from all expenditure sums like in the dashboard page, Pie chart, Bar chart, and Expenditure heatmap.
